1.content:
In the earliest parts of the Thursday, something unexpected had happened. A patch of the ground had started to pulse, it swelled and warped as a figure emerged. The figure grow as it stepped out of the floor, until it's whole body was waling the Earth's surface, the figure was 7 foot tall, she had dark skin, long green hair with twigs in, and was wrapping around her arms like vine which has been left to grow, she was wearing a blue robe, the whole thing was moving, it was a deep, watery blue, and the fabric would wave, emulating water. IT covered her shoulders, torso and a thigh.

Each step she took, left life in it's wake, with patched of grass shaped like her immense foot. Her steps on grass caused the land to become more lively, the grass was greener and had flowers and dandelions, she turned around, and grabbed the stem of a dandelion, and plucked it from the ground with it's roots, and raises it high in the air,, near her mouth, and blew. Each seed was cared on her breath, some for several miles. She placed the dandelion down, and the root acted like legs, or testicles, as it pulled itself to were it was and it's roots dove back into the ground, planting it's self again.

She continued her walk, going to her destination, where a door was locked, but she continued walking, and passed straight thought the wall, emerging on the other side, as if the door was a gas like the air.
Maneuvering her way around the mortal realm, seeing what had become of the planet she molded all those years ago.
She knelled down by a spot of light coming from the moon. Lifting her arm, a small light in her hand formed, as pole ends of a pole expanded from the center of her palm reaching 6 and a half foot long, she grasp the pole, as the top of the staff twinkled a golden shine, and the staff morphed, as it grew features, several arcs formed, two large ones attached at one end to the staff, as two smaller ones appeared below it. At the top of the staff, in between the arc, a shiny blue ball shimmed into view.

"My dear," she said in a gentle voice with the strangest accent, the voice was pleasing to her, even without anybody around.
"Powers of mine, gifted to you." She smiled, lifted the staff up, and a drop of the blue light fell on...
1.title: Inheriting absolute power

11.content:
"To you, Stardust Paws," she declares, as the blue drip falls, landing on your cheek, splatting gently. It spread in every direction, as you glowed blue in response, as the drip brightened up.
"Powers of mine, you have," she said standing up, as the drip faded, and you glowed blue, which soon stopped.
"Divine powers, as me, you have," She explained, "To and use, powers are yours."

The large figure, both divine and generous, turned to leave, as she started to fade.
11.title: You

111.content:
"Waah!" You yelled, flicking up in your bed.
Your sister turned from her dressing table, "Are you alright, Stardust?"
"Yeah, just a weird dream, it was so vivid."
Turning back, "What happened?"
"Very little, I was asleep, but I could see the whole room, she spoke about me getting her divine powers."
"Well, it was just a dream, but it would be really cool if you could," she commented.
You laughed, "It would be, imagine all the things you could do with god like powers."
"Yeah, like making Beth more tolerable, or justice for Keiran and Amy." She grinned, brushing her long Brown hair.
"Or justice on Beth," You fantasied, "Ooh, Being Ms. Cullens favorite student," this caused Lucy to giggle, "And Amy fisher to be total dork."
You both laughed, visualizing the results, being pampered and favouritised by Elizabeth Cullen, and Amy, the most popular girl in the year being unable to function in social situation, missing up words and squawking the ones she did get right.
"Shame that's all impossible," Lucy said, leaving the room, as you got ready for school.
111.title: Waking up 1

choices: You had your own plan of getting more milk
1112.content:
Taking yours steps downstairs, "Why do I have a bad feeling about today," you lament, sorting out the tie of your uniform.
And food over takes over your mind, "Yeah, a nice breakfast could help, a big breakfast, with eggs and bacon," you salivate at the thought.

You stepped into the kitchen, where the rest of the family are, "Morning Stardust," Annabelle greeted you from the kitchen.
"I'm almost done with your breakfast, if you want to come pick it up in a minute." You walked over to stand nearby, and you saw a large plate filled with a variety of breakfast pieces, just like you envisioned. It seemed completed, so you took it, some cutlery and the cup on orange juice next to it.
"Enjoy," She says.
"Thank you," You sit down.

Looking round, everyone was eating except Annabelle and Bethany, Lucy was eating toast, Jeremy was eating toast, Julie was eating wheatabix, and Bethany was in the kitchen pouring her cereal, raisin bran, into a bowl with an assortment of fruit.
"Maybe the dream real, how did Mum know what I wanted, and why," You thought, "And how would I activate it, what are my limits."
Your mind thinks over what it could do, a subtle grin forms, as you twist your hand under the desk.
Julie took a fork of pancake, and eat it, as your father took a bit of the fruit raisin bran. "What will they think?" You wondered.
"Julie," Lucy spoke, "Why are you eating pancakes this morning, I thought you preferred healthy meals?" She asked calmly.
"I just felt like it, okay," Julie retorted defensively.
"And take finished off my raisin bran," Beth said walking over to the fridge, and moaned "And were out of milk again."
"If your fat mammary's were of any use, you could make more," Julie deadpanned as Beth gave a disgusted look.
A light bulb lite up in your head, and then a few more.
.
1112.title: Breakfast with the Paws

choices: You rejoin the family at the breakfast table.
Test your new gift further in the mirror.
11122.content:
Pondering your little sisters words an idea suddenly hit you. If these powers was all real you concentrated on Beth's chest and waited. And as if you have super powers or something, you saw Bethany's chest start visibly swelling. Almost like watching a watermelon grow underneath her blouse in a time-lapse, you couldn't peal your eyes away. Her white blouse rising slowly underneath her as the buttons holding her top together popped off and shot across the room exposing Beth's new larger cleavage. Awestruck to the sudden to the revelation of your gift, you was further astonished as to the deadpan stares the rest of your family gave to sudden change in Beth's chest. And even more so when she nonchalantly unbuttoned the rest of her blouse to expose her new swollen rack to the family.

"Ugh..finally the girls are ready." Beth said as she casually dragged her frilly dark purple bra past her nipples and underneath her enlarged rack allowing her mammaries to spill past the cups.' Anyone want some?" Bethany asked the family who mumbled a decline clearly more interested their own food or phone in Lucy's case her phone rather than her toast. "More for me then!" Bethany chuckled as she licked her lips and positioned her bowl underneath her right breast and let out a deep groan as milk started gushing out from the nipple. Nearly choking on your pancakes you quickly got up from the table ran for the bathroom hiding your dick straining in your pants from the family. "Wonder whats wrong with him?" Bethany said turning her attention away from her chest to watch your sudden panic attack.

It actually was real.. you thought to yourself as you stared at your sweat ridden form leaning against the marble countertop in bathroom mirror. Grinning you repeated that statement in her head..It actually was real. Laughing you traced your right hand underneath your white t-shirt until you landed on your right pec. Closing your eyes you forcibly willed a small pair of milk filled breasts onto your body. Biting your lip as your sensitive nipples made contact with your shirt you could only smile at the small dark spots that suddenly appeared in the same spot as your new tender teats.
11122.title: Take Julie's advise

1113.content:
You were very intrigued, you may or may not have had the powers of the gods. Capable of bending reality and making the world perfect. But, should you, could you, would there be any consequences?
These thoughts raced thought your mind for the next couple of hours, during beakfast you were very quiet, changing into your uniform slowly.
On the bus you just stared out the window.

"Is everything okay, Stardust? You've been quiet all morning." Lucy asked, her voice was very curious in tone but with hints of concern.
You blink, realising you were now on the bus, "Yeah," you replied, you were afraid to talk about it, worrying tat Lucy would make fun of you, but you needed to talk about it, "Still thinking about my dream."
"It was just a dream," She replied calming you, reminding you how kind she was and how she would always be there with you.
"Yeah, but it was so real," You said as your revisited your dream for the eighth time, "I could hear her voice, smell your make-up, feel the bed around me sleeping body."
She sighed, "Then try it. If nothing happens, it was just a dream. If something happens.... That wold be awesome!" She said getting excited, but reeled her self in.
"Yeah," You said, decided to do something here and now.

You thought for a second. Start off small, but noticeable, at least to Lucy...
1113.title: Classes for god

choices: Long,prehensile tails with a hair coating
11133.content:
YOu toss over a couple of thought in your mind, when you can across an old fantasy: Human's having tails.
"That could be fun. To have a 5th appendage," You thought as you started to envision the human race with tails. But what were the tails like?
Were the short tails, like dogs? Long prehensile tails like monkeys? Was it a thick scaly tail, like a crocodile? A plated Tail like a scorpion? Wold they be hairless, a thin coating like the rest of humans, or a thicker fur coat?
YOu had little time to decide, as you eagerly and a little hastily, will it into existence.
11133.title: Screw it, something big

choices: Passive abilities will be all yours.
114.content:
"God, you are not, however," she continued, "Powers to great, death of you."
"Instead...
114.title: "However....

1143.content: Maybe as the earth's god, you have certain responsibilities, such as answers prayers, or moral restrictions on what you can do, for example, not being able to change the base of what something it, like not being about to turn dust into gold, or rock into a diamond.
1143.title: With great power, you get the point

11433.content:
Maybe the powers are extremely temperamental, being very literal, sometimes not working, working when you don't want them to or getting it wrong.
Or,
They are constantly active, with a single word, they activate, like when your sarcastic, or making at joke, they change something or with a thought, the world is at the mercy of went every goes into your head.
11433.title: Another restriction

choices: Another way for the power to back fire.
114332.content: Maybe it is the divinity, everyone knows you are the new god, whether they know your new or believe that you have always been there god is will be a later choice, so they come to your for miracles and praise you, maybe past what your capable of dealing with.
114332.title: Another issue with divinity

115.content:
Maybe instead of giving you divine powers, she gives you a precious and powerful item?
Perhaps she believes that her powers are to great to reside in a human and instead give you a notebook to harness her powers?
Or
Someone a little more limited but still very powerful, the Valentine Bow, a bow capable of bestowing love on recipients of it's arrows?
115.title: Something else

12.content:
The great tall woman made her way up the stairs, her eyes darting from door to door, deciding which to go through, knowing what and who is behind each of the them. She made her choice and made her way through a door, phasing though the existing matter.
Ducking her head, as she sat down beside her heir.....
12.title: Someone else in your house

124.content:
But which parent,
Your Mother Annabelle, or your Father Jeremy?
Or maybe both, granting half of her powers to each, and when working in tandem, they have all the powers, or maybe they both have all the power, or can only use the powers were agreeing and together.
124.title: A parent

15.content:
Who else will receive the divine powers from Gaia?
People from around the country, or world?
An object, granting it owners the power?
Maybe no one, she just give sentience to her powers?
15.title: Someone else

153.content:
What kind of object?
Maybe a well, making it a wishing well, or a stone that grants wishes.
Or a coin, when flipped, grants a wish, head results in granting the wish, but tails causes a back fire or a lamp, causing it to be possessed by a genie, giving three wishes and it moves on.
153.title: An object

info.brief_description: Earth, England, 19 06 2015 the Earth's goddess, Gaia, grants her power to someone.
info.description:
Earth, England Thursday, the 19th of June, 2015, the goddess of earth, Gaia grants her power to the mortal realm, her powers over earth are near infinity, what will be done with them?

Powers, Gaia powers are infinite over the earth, unfortunate, nothing else, but her powers make Earth like play-doh in her hands. Here are some:
Telepathy, as a god, she can hear the thoughts and inner workings of everyone, and influence thought, a little or lot.
Reality manipulation, Gaia is capable of changing reality, if that's earth physics, what happened and when something happened, she can.
Physical manipulation, control over the physical plane, similar to telekinesis, she can alter anything however she wants, make something bigger, or turn it to gold.
Omniscient, as a god, she can be everywhere and knows everything that is going on
Precognition, her all seeing eye see more than everything in the present, she also can see everything that has ever happened, but the future is not set in stone, her gift of free will allows everyone to talk hold of their future.

Passive abilities, Gaia has some powers that are always affecting the world:
Voice of god, when not using sarcasm, the person she is listening to has to believe what ever she says and follow orders.
God's presence, as a god, the atmosphere surrounding her forces most people to be nervous and extremely respectful of her.
Origin form, gods are often depicted as physically perfect, people aspire to be like them.
God's way, her will is nature, most things she does will be left unnoticed by human, but some may be allowed to see what she has down if she lets them.
Auto-Correct, editing the world may make some problems, but your subconscious and reality have it covered, each time something is changed, the world adjust to make sense, like real auto-correct, sometimes it helpful, other times it's not and sometimes the results are hilarious.

Some of these powers are to much for humans, no human is capable of hearing everyone's thoughts, or seeing everything, so they will have to be toned down for human use. And the powers could be too much for a human to handle, and may only be giving some, or they may have cons to company them. There are a lot of them, so I'll high light main characters, Secondary characters, and tertiary characters.
So who will could get the powers?

More characters can be added, either by being used well in the story or by being suggested
Characters:
The Paws.
You, the main character, 15 years old, you will be curios, odd, inventive and kind. An odd character, often coming up with the strangest ideas, many find you difficult to be around but your friends and family can appreciate it, and enjoy the new perspective, he is also kind of a geek and will make all kinds of references. Use your own handle as this characters name. Birthday, 7th of October. 5'3 Brown hair Green eyes
Lucy Paws, your twin sister, also 15, a caring person who will be there to listen to you, and support the choice of those close but she is too kind, not always standing up for her self. She is older than you by 6 minutes, and has the same birthday as you, 7th October. 5'4 brown hair green eyes.
Bethany Paws, Your selfish, narcissistic older sister, 18 years old, she focuses on her self, trying to get the best for her, but she is also the most maternal of your siblings, looking out for you and your sisters when no one does, even if reluctantly. Her birthday is the 5th of April, Prefers Beth. 5'8 Blonde hair Blue eyes
Julie Paws, Your brainy brat of a little sister at 11 years old, she is quite intelligent, bumped up two years, making her rather arrogant, believing her self to be better than many others, and will mostly on logic. Birthday, 15th of September, brown hair, but has heterochromia iridum, different coloured eyes, her left eye is blue, while her right eye is green, she doesn't like talking about it, and frequently wears sunglasses. She is 4'9
Annabelle Paws, Your mother, she is a very caring person, but she will be firm with her treatment and decisions, and always has time for her family, she is 38 and her birthday is the 31st of august. Brown hair, green eyes. 5'5'. Just starting as a secretary.
Jeremy Paws, Your father, Will be strict to prompting development and growth, but he does this because he cares and wants what's best, but when he can, he will do his best to give quality time. Birthday, 3rd of March, brown hair, green eyes. 6'2", a board member of a company, meaning the family is supported well, but he is often way.
Athena, your pet golden retriever, you found her as a puppy stray waiting outside your door with no collar or hints of owner ship, nearly starved, you had insisted that she should be adopted, and she was, four years later, you can only guess that she is 6-7 years old. Athena is normally calm and friendly, no record of aggression, although prone to excitement over things like food, play and a few other things. With her attachment to you, she has a basket in your room. At 16.5" Athena is the runt of the litter
The Paws house hold is small, some people share a room, Parents, You, Julie and Athena, however Beth and Julie do not get along, Beth things she better because she is so beautiful, while Julie thinks her intellect makes her better so everyone tries to keep them separate.

Uncle James Paws: Your fathers younger brother, at age 32, not as professional as Jeremy, instead being playful, friendly and child-like, forcing him to go from job to job, currently working as a cashier at a nearby supermarket, and quite a family man, living for them. 6'2" Brown hairs, green eyes.
Aunty Kelly Croft: Your uncle girlfriend, 33 years old because of his commitment issues, they haven't being engaged yet. She is an athletic fitness trainer, she is a dedicated person, and encourages other to have and reach their goals, and makes sure they do. 6'3" Black hair, brown eyes.
Emma Paws: your eight year old cousin, she is the sweetest person you have met, with a cutesy voice, cute face and gentle friendly nature extremely girly, and innocent. Brown hair, and blue eyes, and 4'1", birthday is 28th January.

Elizabeth Taylor, your 15 year old best friend, she is a lesbian, but has only told her closest friends and family, he is rather playful and uses openness about her opinion as a cover for her sexuality, as she is sensitive about it. Brown eyes, red hair. 5'2"

Randell Darby, another friend, he seems to be quite random and unpredictable, going odd thing constantly, he has a short attention span, jumping from one thing to another easily, you suspect he bi-sexual, as you have seen him hitting on girls and boy, he is very friendly, and most see him as a nuisance, but has a spot in your company, most of the time, he can be handful and really in your face. Red hair with brown eyes, and 5'2, his birthday is 7th of may.

Jayden Collin, a black 15 and close friend of yours, a well rounded person, friendly, but competitive, and enjoys the competition, but understands he doesn't need to win, but won't stop trying, will try out many things, but likes to enjoy his interest with others, and a generally happy person, but refuses to brake any rule. Birthday 1st January, 5'5. Dark blonde hair, green eyes.
Zelda Collin, Jayden's 8 year old sister, a very kind, a little bossy, rather girly, but a little naive and a bit spoiled she is 3'10, dark blonde hair and green eyes, like her brother, she is black. Her birthday is 25 of July.

Cynthia Porter, 37 years old, Annabelle's best friend, and your next neighbor a kind and patient person, but single, she is primary school teacher. 5'6" red hair and blue eyes birthday 19th of august.
Daniel Porter, Cynthia 8 years old son, being playful, energetic and talkative can make him a handful, and is rather oblivious, has a little bit of a feminine face. 29th November, 4'2" Red haired and blue eyes.

Koizumi Keiko, 15 year old Japanese girl, she moved to England a few years ago, and she is your crush, but you are not on a 'first name' basis with her, and insists that you call her Koizumi because of her culture, but she does know you. She a positive and happy person, she is polite and traditional, intelligent and studious. She holds onto her Japanese accent but is fluent in English, knowing it better than most of her peers, although rumors have it that she is a little kinky. 5', pale ginger hair, and blue eyes. Birthday is 1st September

Alex Bishop, Lucy's best friend, a pretty girl, but her grades are under average, but she is determined and will put on a positive spin on things and is a cheerleader. She is 5'2" with blonde hair and brown eyes, her birthday is 25th of august. Although you and Lucy are in the same friend circle.

Claire and Teresa Fletcher, Identical twins, with Teresa being 2 minutes older, are identical in body and mind, sharing similar opinions and behavior, the only difference being their hair, Teresa has braids, while Claire has a pony tail. Both need the newest thing, and flock to what ever is popular, and trying to be the most popular thing, with Beth being the most popular girl in her year. 18 years old, blonde hair, brown eyes, birthday June 11, and are 5'5

Daphne Erikson, 13, Julie best friend, a little dim, but very warm to the few she has around her as an introvert, and is being tutored by Julie, 4'11, blonde hair and brown eyes, birthday is 31st of July.

Keiran Angler and Amy Fisher, two bullies who pick on people because they think it is their right as superior specimens, although neither do well in class, and are dating. But their self-obsessed natures lead to many disagreements and falling outs, breaking up on a weekly basis. Both are 15, Keiran is 5'6 and Amy is 5'5 both are star sportsman, Both have blue eyes, but Keiran has black hair and Amy has blonde hair. Keiran's birthday is 19th of may, while Amy's is 28th of April.

Becky Dexter, 15 years old, very shy, only calm down when around people she knows well, an intelligent person getting good grades, although she has on obsession on you, often stalking you, but you don't know any of this. 4,11, red hair and green eyes, she has a cute face behind her large glasses and fringe. However, this isn't all there is to Becky.
'Bonnie': Having developed a split personality, her second one is unsympathetically, sadistic and possessive, develop to protect Becky by being stronger, and this side also has a crush on you. Her birthday is 1st of June.

Yorath Dexter, 25 years old brother old Becky, a confident person who is very self content, but has developed a person where he needs to be depended on, so, lives his his Mother and sister, he bears a great pain, but does not allow it to show.He is 6'1" with Red hair and green eyes. His birthday is 30th November.

Dorothy Dexter, a 45 year old widow, she used to be lovely woman, very friendly and warm, but she was in a car accident with her husband, who died, while she as severely injuries, but survived. Now, she is has drawn in, and frequently in state of discomfort. Her PTSD has made life for her and her family difficult, but are getting better. Her hair going turning grey, her eyes are brown and she is 5'4. Her birthday is July 10.

Brittany Cullen, 28 years old, your favorite teacher even though you are not that good at English. She has a thick English accent, and has a reputation in school being loved or hated, she helps those who want to learn, rewarding hard workers, meanwhile ignoring those who aren't trying, and brushing off the talented, she seems almost playful with her teaching and treatment, making each lesson like a game. Getting help while others you didn't like got ignored caused a crush on the beautiful teacher for a few years, while crush is gone, you still are fond of her. 5'6 black her, blue eyes birthday is 10th December.

Gaia, the goddess, so named because she is the one god over earth, she is calm and always wears a smile, allowing students to learn from first hand experiences, giving very little direction, but will step in before anything catastrophic. She care deeply for the well-being of her humans, as well as the trees and animals. She does enjoy messing with her mortals. She is a tall woman at 7', she has darken skin with green hair, trailing down to her thighs, and only wears a blue robe, that constantly waves like the ocean, covering most of her body. To her, the planet is her pet, to be groomed and molded, but the animals and plants are her children and cares for each one.

Rules
This story is based in first person, the perspective may change to someone else, but focus on the main character.
The god cares for the live on her planet, her powers will not permit murder and death.
Each chapter has to be a paragraph or more, with the exception going to choice chapters.
Keep all option open, and just no suddenly ending the story.
With the power limited to earth and your imagination, break the limit.
